title: Volkswagen 's EU share : new-car registrations in 2019
summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market share in each Month on the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Month Aug 18 and lowest at Month Sep 18.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Month is 6.1.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Month Aug 18 and lowest at Month Sep 18.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market share in each Month on the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Month Aug 18 and lowest at Month Sep 18.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Month is 6.1.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Month Aug 18 and lowest at Month Sep 18.
Second maximum Market share is found at Month Nov 19.
The Market share of Month Sep 18 is 1.92% smaller than the maximum value at Aug 18.
The Month Aug 18 has the highest Market share, followed by Nov 19, and Oct 19. Down to the Month Sep 18 which is the lowest.
Over the past 17 Months, the Market share has climbed.
Similar Market share is found in Month Jul 19, and Nov 18.
The Month Aug 18 has 1.15 times more Market share than average.
The Market share is 187.8 if we add up values of all Months.
